meanings: (마음이) [명사] anxiety, apprehension, uneasiness, [형용사] anxious, nervous, uneasy, apprehensive, restless
(분위기·정세 등이) [명사] insecurity, (사회적 동요) unrest, (불안정) instability, [형용사] unstable, insecure, precarious

vlive.korean: [불안감 고조] 왜죠? 불안하게? [Raising tension] What's going on? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
[불안] 아니야, 그런 말 하지 마! [Nervous] Don't say such things. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
불안했어? - 아니... Are you nervous? - No... 듣기 View video TWICE : 쯔묶+앞머리👱‍♀️🧒
[불안 불안] 이거 혹시 그 아무 맛도 안 나는... [Worried] Does this taste nothing? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
[불안한 눈빛] - 절대 안 되지 - 지금 여기에... [Anxious] - No way. - Here... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.2 2020 : MYSTERY MYSTERY #2
